item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has revealed a mixed yet cautiously optimistic picture across Indian equities, with 3,234 companies reporting results. Positive earnings surprises have increased modestly compared to previous quarters, driven largely by mid-cap companies, while large caps continue to show steady but less pronounced profit growth. Sectoral leaders and standout performers have emerged, underscoring the evolving dynamics of corporate India’s recovery and growth trajectory. Time: 6 minutes ago

item.title: Are Quadrant Future Tek Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Quadrant Future Tek Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹15.89 crores and a 13.20% decline in revenue year-on-year, with a deeply negative operating margin of -37.47%. The company faces significant operational challenges and has posted losses in five of the last seven quarters, indicating a critical need for remedial action. Time: 33 minutes ago

item.title: Are Mahalaxmi Fabric Mills Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Mahalaxmi Fabric Mills Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹3.40 crores and a 33.92% year-on-year decline in net sales, indicating significant operational challenges and rising debt levels. The company is struggling to achieve profitability, with a negative PAT margin of -10.75%. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Brainbees Solutions Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Brainbees Solutions Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth with net sales increasing by 10.19% year-on-year, but the company still faces significant profitability challenges, reporting a net loss of ₹35.05 crores despite improvements. While the revenue performance is promising, ongoing losses and rising costs highlight the need for better operational efficiency. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Akums Drugs & Pharmaceuticals Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Akums Drugs & Pharmaceuticals Ltd's latest results are concerning, with a 37.46% decline in net profit and stagnant revenue, indicating operational challenges and rising costs that have led to decreased profitability margins. The company needs to address these issues to restore growth and improve financial performance. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Tolins Tyres Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Tolins Tyres Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are concerning, showing a 26.34% decline in net sales and a 25.27% drop in net profit quarter-on-quarter, indicating significant operational challenges and reduced profitability. Despite a strong balance sheet, the company's performance reflects a critical situation that needs addressing for future stability. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Hilltone Software & Gases Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Hilltone Software & Gases Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 92.46% quarter-on-quarter and a net profit turnaround, but ongoing operational inconsistencies and negative return on equity raise concerns about the sustainability of this performance. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Quest Laboratories Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Quest Laboratories Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 68% year-on-year, but profitability has declined significantly, with net profit down 33.66% and operating margins sharply reduced. While the company has a solid return on equity and a strong cash position, concerns about the sustainability of its growth and profitability remain. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Entero Healthcare Solutions Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Entero Healthcare Solutions Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth with net sales up 25.57% year-over-year, but profitability is under pressure with a 12.56% decline in net profit compared to the previous quarter and a contracting profit margin. The company faces challenges in converting revenue growth into sustainable profits, making future performance critical. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Vibhor Steel Tubes Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Vibhor Steel Tubes Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 22% to ₹281.76 crores, but profitability has declined significantly, with net profit down 54.79% to ₹1.42 crores, raising concerns about cost management and rising debt levels. Overall, the company faces operational challenges despite revenue gains. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Honasa Consumer Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Honasa Consumer Ltd's latest results are positive, showing record net sales of ₹601.54 crores and a net profit increase of nearly 93% year-on-year, indicating a strong operational turnaround. However, concerns about working capital efficiency and elevated valuation multiples suggest careful monitoring of future growth sustainability. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Azad Engineering Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Azad Engineering Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are strong, with net sales up 39.30% and net profit up 73.60% year-on-year, indicating effective operational performance. However, concerns about rising debt and capital efficiency remain, despite increased insider confidence. Time: 34 minutes ago

item.title: Are Zaggle Prepaid Ocean Services Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Zaggle Prepaid Ocean Services Ltd reported strong revenue growth of 56% year-on-year, with net sales of ₹525.55 crores and a net profit increase of 84.25%. However, profitability metrics showed some challenges, with a slight contraction in operating and PAT margins, indicating the need for careful management of rising costs. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are Redtape Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Redtape Ltd's latest results are strong, with significant growth in net sales and profit driven by seasonal demand, but concerns about high valuations and increasing leverage may impact future sustainability. Overall, the performance is positive, though caution is advised regarding financial metrics. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are Inox India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Inox India Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth with net sales up 19.64% sequentially and 28.45% year-on-year; however, net profit slightly declined by 0.23% quarter-on-quarter, indicating profitability challenges despite solid operational metrics. The elevated valuation and margin pressures suggest careful monitoring is needed. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are HMA Agro Industries Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: HMA Agro Industries Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 41.54% year-on-year, but profitability is under pressure with a 26.21% decline in net profit from the previous quarter and a contracting operating margin, raising concerns about the sustainability of earnings. Overall, while revenue growth is positive, challenges in margins and reliance on non-core income suggest caution moving forward. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are Divgi Torqtransfer Systems Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Divgi Torqtransfer Systems Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth with net sales up 72.58% year-on-year, but margin pressures and weak return ratios raise concerns about sustainability. While the company has demonstrated robust demand, its reliance on non-operating income and high valuation metrics suggest caution is warranted. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are IRB Infrastructure Trust latest results good or bad?
item.description: IRB Infrastructure Trust's Q3 FY26 results show a strong turnaround with a net profit of ₹2,459.36 crores and record-high sales, but concerns about long-term sustainability remain due to ongoing annual losses and low capital efficiency. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are Senco Gold Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Senco Gold Ltd's latest results are strong, with a 99.92% increase in net sales and a 441.21% rise in net profit for the December quarter, driven by festive demand. However, concerns about cash flow management and the sustainability of margins remain as the company enters a slower period. Time: 35 minutes ago

item.title: Are J A Finance Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: J A Finance Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹0.06 crores and a 32.10% decline in revenue compared to the previous quarter, indicating significant operational challenges and a lack of sustainable earnings. The company's financial performance reflects severe issues, including declining revenues and high interest expenses, making it a high-risk investment. Time: 35 minutes ago
